name: Let Me Out (Hegback)
description:
This time 2ezStudios are proud to present a collaborative work with cwkitkat, a Let Me Out game where players are controlling robots desiring to escape from its monotonous lives by killing its brethren!

This is kind of an action game where you just need to kill robots.

Actually, no. You still have to know how to manage your fuels before you run outta juice to go on any satisfying rampage! 

Like how your PETROL is your ammo; COAL being your fuel for moving around; and how your WATER indicates how much life you have left! 

Good luck!

Controls:

MOVE - Arrow Keys

DASH - Z

FIRE - X
